EmailTemplate.description: Used to announce incentive for completing training by 7/7 - REMINDER
EmailTemplate.name: 10K Way Training Program Reward - REMINDER
EmailTemplate.subject: REMINDER - 10K Way Completion Reward Ends July 7!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello!
For all of those who have already earned the 10K Way badge: Congratulations!
For those who still need to complete the 10K Way: We wanted to remind you that we are looking for you to complete the course by July 15 but as an extra incentive, weâ€™re offering a special reward to all who complete the course by July 7!
You don't want to miss out!
Thank you,
10K Delivery
